plot: Roy Mitchell is a large man and Eugenio Salsas is his svelte lover. Together they discuss the prejudice against large men (Bears) and their relationship.
title: No soy un oso
plot_es: Roy Mitchell is a large man and Eugenio Salsas is his svelte lover. Together they discuss the prejudice against large men (Bears) and their relationship.
plot_en: Roy Mitchell is a large man and Eugenio Salsas is his svelte lover. Together they discuss the prejudice against large men (Bears) and their relationship.
